description: BR-32 is the designated District Transport Office for Madhubani, situated in the Mithila region of Bihar. This office is responsible for vehicle registrations, issuing driving licenses, and enforcing transport regulations across a district known for its rich cultural heritage and proximity to the Nepal border. It serves as a vital hub for transport administration in the Darbhanga division, managing connectivity within the rural and semi-urban landscapes of North Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Bhoop Narayan Singh Colony, Madhubani, Bihar
